Description: The cycler_wreckage entity emits smoke and shows a custom sprite.

KeyDescriptions.keyDescription: Set the sprite's framerate in Hertz. Only makes sense for animated sprites.
Set name of {{ entname }} so other entities can kill-target it (can't be triggered).
Specify a valid sprite-file to display here. Path starts from within the modification's folder e.g.'models/cleansuit_scientist.mdl'
Set the sprite's y- and x-scale.

Notes: Sprites are barely visible under emitted smoke.
